title: 🍊 "You've got to get up every morning with a smile on your face and show the world all the love in your heart." - Carole King
content:
Given a list, swap every two adjacent nodes. Something to think about: How would your code change if this were a linked list, versus an array?

Example:

> swapPairs([1,2,3,4])
> [2,1,4,3]

> swapPairs([])
> []
